titleStmt.title: Naboth's vinyard, or, The innocent traytor copied from the orginal of Holy Scripture : in heroick verse.
titleStmt.author: Caryll, John, 1625-1711.

notesStmt.note: Written by John Caryll. Cf. MacDonald, H. John Dryden, 190a.
One of two editions issued in 1679.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
